SELECT cqj_staff.`staffid`AS staffId,cqj_staff.`staffname`AS staffName,cqj_staff.`staffnub`AS staffNum,cqj_staff.`age`AS staffAge, cqj_staff.`standby1`AS startTime,cqj_staff.`standby2`AS endTime,cqj_user.`status`AS staffStatue , cqj_staff.`positionid`AS positionId,IFNULL(`img`.`url`,'/static/img/defaultStaffImg.png')AS url,zzy_course.`cid`AS courseId,zzy_course.`course_name`AS courseName FROM `cqj_staff` INNER JOIN `cqj_user` ON cqj_user.`usertypeid` = cqj_staff.`staffid` AND cqj_user.usertypenub = 0 #员工 LEFT JOIN `zzy_teacher_ability` ON `zzy_teacher_ability`.`tid` = cqj_staff.`staffid` LEFT JOIN zzy_course ON zzy_course.`cid` = zzy_teacher_ability.`cid` LEFT JOIN `img` ON `img`.`id` = cqj_user.`userid` WHERE cqj_staff.`staffid` = #{staffId} #员工id
SELECT cqj_staff.`staffid` AS staffId,cqj_staff.`staffname`AS staffName,cqj_staff.`age` AS staffAge FROM `cqj_staff` WHERE cqj_staff.positionid = 6 #班主任职位id AND ISNULL(standby2) #在职员工
SELECT cqj_staff.* FROM cqj_staff INNER JOIN cqj_position ON cqj_staff.`positionid`=cqj_position.`positionid` WHERE cqj_position.`positionid`=5

SELECT MAX(RIGHT(`cqj_staff`.`staffnub`,12))AS maxNub FROM `cqj_staff` WHERE `cqj_staff`.`staffnub` LIKE CONCAT('%',YEAR(NOW()),SUBSTR(NOW(),6,2),SUBSTR(NOW(),9,2),'%') WHERE cqj_position.`positionname`='任课老师'
